alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 04 at 10:59AM CDT until April 04 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WHITESIDE...CARROLL...SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON AND NORTHEASTERN CLINTON COUNTIES... At 1058 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Argo Fay, or 8 miles southwest of Mount Carroll, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mount Carroll, Fairhaven, Franklin Corners, Chadwick, Lanark, Milledgeville, Carroll County Fairgrounds, Hitt and Shannon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
